text: jab maamale ka faisala ho chukega tab shaitaan kahega, "allaah ne to tumase sachcha vaada kiya tha aur mainne bhee tumase vaada kiya tha, phir mainne to tumase saty ke pratikool kaha tha. aur mera to tumapar koee adhikaar nahin tha, sivaay isake ki mainne maan lee; balki apane aap hee ko malaamat karo, na main tumhaaree fariyaad sun sakata hoon aur na tum meree fariyaad sun sakate ho. pahale jo tumane sahabhaagee thaharaaya tha, main usase virakt hoon." nishchay hee atyaachaariyon ke lie dukhadaayinee yaatana hai
